title: Defective Product - Refund or Replacement
description: When you purchase a product that is defective, damaged, or not as described and the seller refuses to provide refund or replacement

rights.title: Right to Refund or Replacement
rights.description: Consumers have the right to get refund or replacement for defective goods within reasonable time

rights.title: Right to Compensation for Damages
rights.description: Right to claim compensation for any loss or damage caused by defective products

rights.title: Right to Quality Goods and Services
rights.description: Fundamental right to receive goods and services that meet quality standards

actionSteps.title: Preserve Purchase Documentation
actionSteps.description: Keep safe the bill/invoice, warranty card, product packaging, and payment receipts

actionSteps.title: Document Product Defects
actionSteps.description: Take photographs/videos of the defective product and note down all issues clearly

actionSteps.title: Contact Seller for Resolution
actionSteps.description: Approach the seller/retailer first for immediate refund or replacement

actionSteps.title: Escalate to Manufacturer if Needed
actionSteps.description: If seller refuses, contact manufacturer's customer service for warranty claims

actionSteps.title: File Consumer Court Complaint
actionSteps.description: File complaint with District Consumer Disputes Redressal Commission

variations: Bought faulty product, seller refusing refund
Product not working, want money back
